alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 11:37AM CDT until May 09 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lincoln County in central Kansas... Russell County in central Kansas... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1135 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Ionia to 8 miles south of Plainville, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters have reported quarter sized hail and winds up to 80mph in Rooks and Osborne counties. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Russell, Lucas, Gorham, Sylvan Grove, Luray, Barnard, Paradise, Waldo, Ash Grove, Russell Airport and Wilson Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 175 and 189. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Winds of 60 to 70 mph winds may preceded the main rain and hail threat from the storms in question. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
